title: Debuggers-Final-Project
description: The project is a language exchange program website that allows student users to connect with language buddies to develop their language skills. It also allows admin users to create, edit, and delete upcoming events. The project uses React, Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL.

title: Full Stack Project Assessment
description: This is a web application that allows users to save YouTube videos to watch later. The project uses React, Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL.

title: London-mini-guid
description: This is a web application that provides a guide to various locations in London, including pharmacies, doctors' offices, hospitals, and colleges. Users can select a city and view information about each location, including their website, phone number, and address. The project uses React and Node.js for the frontend and backend development, respectively.

title: Food-order-app
description: This is a web application that enables users to place food orders and calculates the total cost. The project is built using React.
